config.fabrizoom.title: FabriZoom Config
config.fabrizoom.zoomdivisor.tooltip: The amount to initially zoom in
config.fabrizoom.minzoomdivisor.tooltip: The minimum amount of zoom allowed
config.fabrizoom.maxzoomdivisor.tooltip: The maximum amount of zoom allowed
config.fabrizoom.mouse.normal.title: Normal Mode (Default)
config.fabrizoom.mouse.sensitivity.toolt: Amount to reduce mouse sensitivity by while zooming. Higher is more sensitive
config.fabrizoom.mouse.cinematic.title: Cinematic Camera Mode
config.fabrizoom.mouse.cinematic.tooltip: Whether to apply a cinematic camera effect to the mouse while zooming
config.fabrizoom.mouse.cinematicmultipli: Amount of cinematic camera effect. Lower is stronger
category.fabrizoom.transition.descriptio: The transition to and from zooming
config.fabrizoom.transition.tooltip: The transition to and from zooming
config.fabrizoom.linearstep.min.tooltip: The minimum linear step for linear transitions
config.fabrizoom.linearstep.max.tooltip: The maximum linear step for linear transitions
config.fabrizoom.smoothmultiplier.toolti: Multiplier for smooth transitions. Lower is stronger
